oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Introduction to the special issue: mineral prospectivity analysis and quantitative resource estimation
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PORWAL, AK
KREUZER, OP
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: mineral prospectivity analysis
quantitative resource estimation
exploration
deposit
prediction
australia

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This introduction provides an overview of the history, present status, and future perspective of research in the fields of mineral prospectivity analysis and quantitative resource estimation. It also summarizes the papers included in the Special Issue. (c) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
